title: Print, "Proofs for four plates of "Alfabeto in Sogno" [Dream Alphabet]:  Letter G", 1683
medium: White laid paper with red crayon
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of Mrs. John Innes Kane
description: Central image of a mermaid blowing a horn forms a G. Additional drawings of four cherubim and a cork.

tombstone.epitaph:
Print, "Proofs for four plates of "Alfabeto in Sogno" [Dream Alphabet]:  Letter G", 1683.
1683. White laid paper with red crayon. Museum purchase through gift of Mrs. John Innes Kane. 1944-24-8-b.
